TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ProjectStartedEventArgs extends Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 事件的資料。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 警告： 將標示 [Serializable] 型別，而實作 ISerializable 會加諸序列化合約--它是不會再變更類型的承諾也就是欄位類型不是不可變的;將新欄位類型的下一版中新增未遵循特定的特殊 FX 指導方針，可能會中斷往後和回溯相容性WARNING: marking a type [Serializable] without implementing ISerializable imposes a serialization contract -- it is a promise to never change the type's fields i.e. the type is immutable; adding new fields in the next version of the type without following certain special FX guidelines, can break both forward and backward compatibility ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何撰寫基本記錄器回應建置事件。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得事件的項目清單。

span.span: Gets the list of items for the event.
The list of items for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目和中繼資料透過存取會保持最新狀態和可列舉整個專案的組建。The items and metadata accessed through are kept up-to-date and can be enumerated throughout the build of the project. 不過，變更這份清單中的項目時，不會影響在建置程序。However, changing an item in this list will not affect the build process. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不適用於多處理器建置。This property does not work with multi-proc builds. 若要取得正確結果，您可以關閉多處理器建置藉由指定`/m:1`（此為預設值）。To get proper results, you can turn off multi-proc building by specifying `/m:1` (which is the default).

summary.span: 提供內容位置資訊，包括叫用此專案建置的專案 (如果有)。

span.span: Provides contextual location information, including the project if any that invoked the build of this project.

value.span: 物件，表示事件的項目清單。

span.span: A object representing the list of items for the event.

summary.span: 取得事件的屬性清單。

span.span: Gets the list of properties for the event.
The list of properties for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性名稱和值透過存取會保持最新狀態和可列舉整個專案的組建。The property names and values accessed through are kept up-to-date and can be enumerated throughout the build of the project. 不過，變更這份清單中的屬性時，不會影響在建置程序。However, changing a property in this list will not affect the build process. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不適用於多處理器建置。This property does not work with multi-proc builds. 若要取得正確結果，您可以關閉多處理器建置藉由指定`/m:1`（此為預設值），或環境變數設定，藉以解決此限制。To get proper results, you can either turn off multi-proc building by specifying `/m:1` (which is the default), or you can work around the limitation by setting an environment variable. 例如，設定`MSBuildForwardPropertiesFromChild=configuration;platform`轉送的 「 設定 」 和 「 平台 」 屬性項目子節點。For example, setting `MSBuildForwardPropertiesFromChild=configuration;platform` forwards the "configuration" and "platform" properties from the child nodes. 除非已定義這個環境變數，將會轉送執行任何動作。Unless this environment variable is defined, nothing will be forwarded. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：在組建中使用環境變數](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f9e4469-8865-4b59-aab3-3ff26bd36e77)。For more information, see [How to: Use Environment Variables in a Build](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f9e4469-8865-4b59-aab3-3ff26bd36e77).
